channel.title: Chapter 11: Multiclass Classification on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 11: Multiclass Classification on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 12.1: Multiclass Classification and Losses
item.description: In this section, we introduce the basic concepts in multiclass (MC) classification and important MC losses: MC 0-1 loss, MC brier score, and MC logarithmic loss.

item.title: Chapter 12.2: Softmax Regression
item.description: In this section, we introduce softmax regression as a generalization of logistic regression.

item.title: Chapter 12.3: One-vs-One and One-vs-Rest
item.description: It is sometimes advisable to address a multiclass problem as a set of binary ones. We discuss two ways to reduce a multiclass problem to multiple binary classification problems: one-vs-one and one-vs-rest.

item.title: Chapter 12.4: Designing Codebooks and ECOC
item.description: In this section, we introduce codebooks as a general concept for multiclass to binary reduction.
